metadata.title: USN-2406-1 -- OpenStack Keystone vulnerability
metadata.description: Brant Knudson discovered that OpenStack Keystone did not properly perform input sanitization when performing endpoint catalog substitution. A remote attacker with privileged access for creating endpoints could exploit this to obtain sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2406-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  keystone-doc - 1:2014.1.3-0ubuntu2.1 keystone - 1:2014.1.3-0ubuntu2.1 python-keystone - 1:2014.1.3-0ubuntu2.1 No subscription required
